thread.title: Hamed Karzai international airport shootings kills 5 civilians
thread.title_full: Hamed Karzai international airport shootings kills 5 civilians

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Hamed Karzai international airport shootings kills 5 civilians
text:
Hamed Karzai international airport shootings kills 5 civilians eTN   
Aug 10, 2015 Banners   
Five people were killed and more than 17 were wounded in a suicide attack at the entrance of Kabul Airport in Afghanistan on Monday. 
The Kabul police chief said that all victims of Hamed Karzai international airport shootings are civilians.
